posts.post_title: FS:SGC 40 Ty Cobb Red Portrait Polar Bear SOLD Thanks
posts.post_content: Hello.Im looking to sell this particular to fund another purchase.I am asking for  with shipping included on this one.Back scans available upon request.If you have any interest please contact me.Thanks and have a good one.Jason
